subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James had a game-high 31 points to go with 10 rebounds, 5 assists and 2 blocks, and he helped limit Tony Parker. But without help, he could not stop the Spurs.
snippet: LeBron James had a game-high 31 points to go with 10 rebounds, 5 assists and 2 blocks, and he helped limit Tony Parker. But without help, he could not stop the Spurs.
